item.description:
New Haven Area Dining Out Group



2009 Holiday Party



We're having a party to celebrate what has been a great year, gather with new and old friiends and spread some holiday cheer. We will decorate Alisa's Tree while we're their too. Please join us with a dish to share, a small gift for a FUN Yankee Gift Exchange - the gift should cost no more than $15, it can be something nice, practical or raunchy - you decide, it will go into a pile annonymously and then the fun begins. If you have a favorite Holiday CD feel free to bring it. This will also be BYOB.

Sign up early as this will fill early .

Thank you Alisa for opening up your home to us for this event, we could not have done it without you.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: 2009 Holiday Party
